text_block_list.text:
It was the first day of training since 
Super Creek became part of my charge.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Fufu～ I'm excited to see what kind 
of training we're going to do.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, I'm looking forward to working with you today.

Ah, well, even though he's new, he's still a trainer. 
- just like she'd said, I'm still a trainer, so 
I must do everything I can for her.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Yes, let's do our best.
Thus began the training, and a few hours later…

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hah… phew… 10 laps of the course, all done!

I tried making her a training regimen after 
watching her run in the Selection Race…

Judging from what I could see, she looked to be struggling a 
bit. Maybe it was too hard for her?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry for taking such a long time.
choice_data_list: I'm sorry, too. I didn't know how much to add or subtract…

text_block_list.text:
I was thinking that I might have been too ecstatic by becoming 
Super Creek's trainer, and so on.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Fufu～ there, there.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry too much about it, ok? 
Now we know better for next time.

I'm amazed that I got to become the trainer for such a kind 
hearted horse girl with an impeccable talent for running.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …what're you guys doin' in the middle of the course?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Ah～ Tama-chan.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Let me introduce you, Trainer-san. This is my friend, Tama-chan.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
JUST Tamamo Cross! If yer gonna introduce 
me, you gotta do it properly.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
I heard that Creek got herself a trainer, 
so I had to check him out.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Looks like Creek has already started to spoil ya.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Yep. Creek spoils everyone. She's like 
a caretaker, always pamperin' everyone.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Fufu～ my family actually owns a daycare center.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I often help out and take care of the little ones, so I guess I 
have a habit of spoiling them～

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Makes sense. You always like to take care of ‘em like you're 
their mother or somethin'.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Wait a sec… does that mean you've been treatin' me like a 
kindergartener this whole time?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hmmmm… sometimes it may look that way, but Tama-chan is more of 
a wonderful, big sister.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Is that how you see me?! Anyway, I know I yapped a lot, but 
Creek really is a good friend of mine.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Don't become a spoiled brat, and be 
sure to keep an eye out for her!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Oh, you're leaving already? Come back soon!

So… now that I'm Super Creek's trainer, I 
want to help her run as best as she can.

To do that, I need to be a trainer that 
she can rely on, not some spoiled child!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for your hard work today, Trainer-san. I look forward to 
working with you again tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Ah- huh?

Super Creek's gaze fell upon a pile of cup noodles that I'd 
bought and left lying around.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Do you often eat cup noodles?
choice_data_list: Well, every once in a while…

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm… you have to eat healthy things like vegetables, too, 
otherwise you won't have good nutritional balance, you know?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
”Fufu～ In that case, I'll make you dinner tonight. I'll deliver 
it to you once it's done.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Now, off to- wait, is this?
Her gaze falls to a jersey on the ground.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Do you often leave clothes lying around?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: They're all wrinkled because you didn't put them on hangers.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: I'll iron them for you, but please be more careful from now on.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Eh? What's this? Those magazines are a mess…

Just when I was trying not to be spoiled 
by her, she spoiled me all over again.
